# Lunar Longing: Reflections on God's Faithfulness
## Scripture
"Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path." - Psalm 119:105

## Reflection
As we gaze up at the winter sky, the moon's phases remind us of the ebbs and flows of our faith journey. Just as the moon waxes and wanes, our experiences of God's presence can vary. Yet, in the midst of uncertainty, we can hold fast to God's promise of guidance. The psalmist's words remind us that God's Word is a constant source of light, illuminating our path and reassuring us of His faithfulness. As we navigate life's challenges, may we find comfort in the steady glow of God's love, just as the moon's gentle light pierces the darkness.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we marvel at the moon's gentle light, remind us of Your unwavering faithfulness. Help us to trust in Your guidance, even when the path ahead seems uncertain. May Your Word be a lamp to our feet, illuminating our journey and filling us with confidence in Your love. As we walk in the light of Your presence, may we reflect Your glory to a world in need of hope. Amen.
